statements: SELECT * FROM FinancialReports
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT report_id, report_name FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_name LIKE 'Quarterly%'
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_date DESC
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_parameters FROM FinancialReports
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT report_name, report_id FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM FinancialReports WHERE report_id IN (1, 5, 10);
SELECT * FROM FinancialReports ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT report_id, report_name, report_date FROM FinancialReports WHERE JSON_CONTAINS(report_parameters, '"type":"quarterly"', '$.period');
SELECT * FROM financial_reports;
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_name = 'Monthly Sales Report';
SELECT report_id, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT report_id, report_params FROM financial_reports WHERE report_params ->> 'department' = 'Sales';
SELECT * FROM report_parameters ORDER BY param_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports WHERE report_date >= '2021-01-01' AND report_date <= '2021-12-31';
SELECT report_name, report_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_name LIKE 'Quarterly%';
SELECT report_name, JSONB_AGGR(report_params) FROM financial_reports GROUP BY report_name;
SELECT * FROM financial_reports JOIN report_parameters ON financial_reports.report_id = report_parameters.param_id WHERE param_name = 'Total Revenue';
SELECT report_name, param_name, param_value FROM financial_reports JOIN report_parameters ON financial_reports.report_params->>param_name = report_parameters.param_name;

SELECT report_name, creation_date FROM financial_reports WHERE report_id = 3;
SELECT metadata_key, metadata_value FROM reports_metadata WHERE report_id = 1;
SELECT query_id, query, execution_date FROM query_history ORDER BY execution_date DESC;
